user.title: WillyWeather Setup - Station Selection
user.description:
Step 1 of 6: Enter your WillyWeather API key.

**Get your API key:**
Visit https://www.willyweather.com.au/api/register.html to register and obtain your free API key.

**Station ID:**
Leaving the Station ID blank will automatically set it to the closest WillyWeather station to your Home Assistant Home Zone location. You can also manually enter a specific station ID if preferred.

observational.title: WillyWeather Setup - Observation Sensors
observational.description:
Step 2 of 6: Configure optional observation sensors for {station_name}

**Observation Sensors** provide current weather conditions (updated every 10-30 minutes):
- Temperature, humidity, wind, pressure (always included when observational is enabled)
- UV index (requires UV forecast enabled on your API key)
- Tide information (requires tides enabled on your API key, coastal locations only)
- Swell data (requires swell enabled on your API key, coastal locations only)

**Note:** If optional features aren't enabled on your API key, they will be silently skipped.

data.include_observational: Include observational sensors (temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, etc.)
data.include_tides: Include tide information (Note: Not all areas have tidal information)
data.include_swell: Include swell data (coastal locations only, Note: Not all areas have swell information)

forecast_options.title: WillyWeather Setup - Forecast Data Options
forecast_options.description:
Step 3 of 6: Configure forecast data options for {station_name}

**Forecast Data** (retrieved via weather.get_forecasts service call):
- Wind forecast data adds wind speed/direction to forecast (requires wind enabled on your API key)

**Forecast Sensors** create individual sensors for each day with temperature, rain, UV, etc.:
- Enable the checkbox below to configure forecast sensors later
- No additional API calls required
- Perfect for custom Lovelace cards
- Easy automation triggers

data.include_wind: Include wind forecast data (adds wind to weather.get_forecasts)
data.include_forecast_sensors: Include daily forecast sensors (if enabled, you'll select which sensors in step 5)

warnings.title: WillyWeather Setup - Weather Warning Sensors

forecast_sensors.title: WillyWeather Setup - Forecast Sensor Selection
forecast_sensors.description:
Step 5 of 6: Select which forecast sensors to create for {station_name}

**Select Sensors:**
Choose which data points to track for each forecast day.

**Number of Days:**
Use the slider to select forecast days (1 = today only, 7 = today + next 6 days).

**Note:** Extended forecast text is available as the 'extended_forecast' attribute on the 'Today's Forecast' observational sensor.

update_intervals.title: WillyWeather Setup - Update Intervals
update_intervals.description:
Step 6 of 6: Configure update intervals for {station_name}

Separate intervals for observational (current conditions) and forecast data reduce API usage.

**Default setup:**
- Observational: 10/30 min (day/night)
- Forecast: 30/60 min (day/night)
- Total: ~7,920 API calls/month

data.night_start_hour: Night start hour (0-23, e.g., 21 for 9 PM)
data.night_end_hour: Night end hour (0-23, e.g., 7 for 7 AM)

init.title: WillyWeather Observation Sensors
init.description:
Configure observation sensors (current weather conditions).

**Observation Sensors** provide current weather data updated every 10-30 minutes.

Changing these options will reload the integration.

data.include_observational: Include observational sensors (temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, etc.)
data.include_tides: Include tide information (Note: Not all areas have tidal information)
data.include_swell: Include swell data (Note: Not all areas have swell information)

forecast_options.title: WillyWeather Forecast Data Options
forecast_options.description:
Configure forecast data options.

**Wind Forecast:** Adds wind speed/direction to weather.get_forecasts service.

**Forecast Sensors:** Create individual sensors for each day. No additional API calls required.

Changing these options will reload the integration.

data.include_wind: Include wind forecast data (adds wind to weather.get_forecasts)

forecast_sensors.title: WillyWeather Forecast Sensor Selection
forecast_sensors.description:
Select which forecast sensors to create.

**Sensors:** Choose data points to track.
**Days:** Use the slider to select forecast days (1 = today only, 7 = today + next 6 days).

**Note:** Extended forecast text is available as the 'extended_forecast' attribute on the 'Today's Forecast' observational sensor.

Changing these options will reload the integration.

warnings.title: WillyWeather Weather Warning Sensors
warnings.description:
Configure weather warning sensors.

**Weather Warnings:** Binary sensors that alert you to dangerous weather conditions.

Changing these options will reload the integration.

update_intervals.title: WillyWeather Update Intervals
update_intervals.description:
Configure separate update intervals for observational and forecast data.

Separate intervals reduce API usage while keeping current conditions fresh. Changing these options will reload the integration.

**Cost reference:** AUD $0.20 per 1000 requests

data.night_end_hour: Night end hour (0-23, e.g., 7 for 7 AM)
